attributes.action: Provide our serving troops with the right equipment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many serving soldiers struggle with equipment that is unfit for the job it is being provided for such as the snatch land rover, vector and the need for more helicopters with pilots.
As the recent reports show support for our troops is there we just need to make people aware.
As an army wife I thank you for your support
